text_logic_form: Find the area of the shape $ABCD$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of the shape $ABCD$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AC$ is $22$.
The length of the line $AD$ is $17$.
line_instances: There are lines $AC$, $AD$, $CB$, and $DB$ forming the shape $ABCD$.
The lines $AC$ and $DB$ intersect at point $A$.
The lines $CB$ and $DB$ intersect at point $B$.
